all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function setPublicCapability(
-         address target,
-         bytes4 functionSig,
-         bool enabled
-     ) public virtual requiresAuth 
+ function setPublicCapability(
+         address target,
+         bytes4 functionSig,
+         bool enabled
+     ) public onlyOwner virtual requiresAuth

all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function setRoleCapability(
-         uint8 role,
-         address target,
-         bytes4 functionSig,
-         bool enabled
-     ) public virtual requiresAuth 
+ function setRoleCapability(
+         uint8 role,
+         address target,
+         bytes4 functionSig,
+         bool enabled
+     ) public onlyOwner virtual requiresAuth

all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function setUserRole(
-         address user,
-         uint8 role,
-         bool enabled
-     ) public virtual requiresAuth 
+ function setUserRole(
+         address user,
+         uint8 role,
+         bool enabled
+     ) public onlyOwner virtual requiresAuth
